summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. B-156, for the improvement of West 47th Street (formerly "C" Street) from 11th Avenue Northwest to 15th Avenue Northwest; by constructing a sewer therein, with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 1236 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
